scripts.infra:logs:clickhouse: cd infra/docker && docker compose logs -f clickhouse
scripts.infra:logs:redis: cd infra/docker && docker compose logs -f redis
scripts.infra:logs:postgres: cd infra/docker && docker compose logs -f postgres
scripts.infra:logs:kafka: cd infra/docker && docker compose logs -f kafka
scripts.infra:logs:zookeeper: cd infra/docker && docker compose logs -f zookeeper
scripts.infra:reset: cd infra/docker && docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d
scripts.db:health:all: pnpm db:health:clickhouse && pnpm db:health:postgres && pnpm db:health:redis && pnpm db:health:kafka
scripts.db:health:postgres: docker exec $(docker ps -qf name=postgres) pg_isready -U postgres || exit 1
scripts.db:health:redis: docker exec $(docker ps -qf name=redis) redis-cli ping || exit 1
scripts.db:health:kafka: docker exec $(docker ps -qf name=kafka) kafka-broker-api-versions --bootstrap-server localhost:9092 || exit 1
scripts.db:connect:postgres: docker exec -it $(docker ps -qf name=postgres) psql -U postgres
scripts.kafka:topics:list: docker exec $(docker ps -qf name=kafka) kafka-topics --bootstrap-server localhost:9092 --list
scripts.kafka:topics:create: docker exec $(docker ps -qf name=kafka) kafka-topics --bootstrap-server localhost:9092 --create --topic
scripts.kafka:consumer: docker exec -it $(docker ps -qf name=kafka) kafka-console-consumer --bootstrap-server localhost:9092 --topic
scripts.kafka:producer: docker exec -it $(docker ps -qf name=kafka) kafka-console-producer --bootstrap-server localhost:9092 --topic
